author: Leigh Beadon
description: This week, both our top winners on the insightful side come in response to our post about DOGE and the disaster in Texas. In first place, it’s That Anonymous Coward with a reaction to the government’s response: Devoting a large portion of a press conference to patting themselves on the back & praising the god […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
